abstract: Federal prosecutors intend to call the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway to testify against five former insurance executives accused of helping A.I.G. manipulate its financial statements.
snippet: Federal prosecutors intend to call the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway to testify against five former insurance executives accused of helping A.I.G. manipulate its financial statements.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors are expected to call Warren E. Buffett, the chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, to testify in the trial of five senior insurance executives accused of helping the American International Group manipulate its finances through $500 million in fraudulent transactions, according to court papers filed yesterday.

headline.main: Buffett Is Named as a Witness in the Fraud Trial of 5 Insurance Executives
headline.print_headline: Buffett Is Named as a Witness in the Fraud Trial of 5 Insurance Executives
